title: Rising wages a cause of cost-push inflation

content.question: Which of the following would generate cost-push inflation?

choices.label: An increase in the price of labor
A decrease in the price of energy
An increase in the money supply

content.answer: An increase in the price of labor

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
